alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 6:24PM EDT until May 21 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CATTARAUGUS AND SOUTHERN CHAUTAUQUA COUNTIES... At 623 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lakewood, or 8 miles west of Jamestown, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Lakewood, Falconer, Clymer, Long Point State Park, Jamestown West, Frewsburg, Chautauqua, Busti and Gerry. This includes Interstate 86 between exits 6 and 15. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
